title: A Touch of Time
description: The power of the towers must rise to seal Earth’s fateAs the last prophecy draws to its conclusion, the whole of the earth is at risk. Evil is everywhere and the forces of the dark are on the rise. As their enemies approach, the battle begins in earnest. Now is the time for Ascara, Magda, and Lucinda to make their last stand in this war to end all wars. United, through the towers of the earth, the people of the world, fight to keep the hordes at bay. But when tragedy strikes closer to home Magda faces a devastating dilemma she had hoped she'd never face. To save one precious life, she must open the gates of time and risk every last soul.This concludes the Towers of the Earth Series.
author: Nita Round
